name: In re ESTATE of W. A. MILLER, alias dictus Walter A. Miller, Deceased. Appeal of Edith HOPKINS, Administrator

judges: Before O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
EAGEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
parties: In re ESTATE of W. A. MILLER, alias dictus Walter A. Miller, Deceased. Appeal of Edith HOPKINS, Administrator.

opinions.text:
OPINION
PER CURIAM:
Decree affirmed. Each side to pay own costs.
EAGEN, C. J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Scott O. Mears, Greensburg, for appellant.
Richard F. Flickinger, Ligonier, for appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
384 A.2d 240
In re ESTATE of W. A. MILLER, alias dictus Walter A. Miller, Deceased. Appeal of Edith HOPKINS, Administrator.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued March 13, 1978.
Decided April 7, 1978.
Scott O. Mears, Greensburg, for appellant.
Richard F. Flickinger, Ligonier, for appellee.
Before O’BRIEN, ROBERTS, POMEROY, NIX, MANDERINO and LARSEN, JJ.
